title: SCRIBE Metadata Schema
description: Definitive structure for the metadata associated with every chunk in the SCRIBE knowledge base.

id.description: A unique, system-generated identifier for the chunk.

source_id.description: Identifier for the parent document from which the chunk originates.

author.description: The author(s) or attributed author(s) of the work.

publication_date.description: The year of publication or composition (negative for BC).

source_url.description: A direct URL to the original source material.

language.description: The ISO 639-2 language code of the chunk's text.

canonical_reference.description: A standardized, human-readable, and citable reference.

text_type.description: The genre or type of text.

chunk_level.description: The level of this chunk within the document's hierarchy.

parent_chunk_id.description: The ID of the immediate parent chunk in the hierarchy.

original_language_id.description: The ID of the corresponding chunk in the original language.

topics_keywords.description: A list of key topics, themes, or keywords present in the chunk.

relation_intertextuality.description: An array of canonical references to other texts quoted or alluded to.

relation_commentary.description: An array of source IDs for texts that are commentaries on this chunk.

relation_thematic.description: An array of chunk IDs that are thematically similar.

historical_context.description: A brief description of the historical period and relevant context.
